_comment: server_config.json - Remote Control Server Configuration Template
_description: यह file server द्वारा serve की जाएगी। Client हर 5 minutes पर fetch करेगा।
_heartbeat_interval_doc: Socket heartbeat frequency in milliseconds. Default: 30000 (30 seconds)

photo_compression._doc: JPEG quality (0-100), max resolution in pixels. quality=80 = good balance

_auto_upload_interval_doc: Batch photo upload frequency in milliseconds. Default: 300000 (5 minutes)
_enabled_commands_doc: Whitelist of allowed commands. Empty array [] means ALL commands are allowed.
_encryption_enabled_doc: Enable TLS/SSL for socket connection. Set false only for development.
_logging_level_doc: Log verbosity: VERBOSE | DEBUG | INFO | WARN | ERROR
_signing_secret_doc: HMAC-SHA256 signing secret for request integrity. Leave empty to disable signing.
_notes: सभी interval values milliseconds में हैं
signing_secret production में random 32+ char string होनी चाहिए
encryption_enabled: true करना strongly recommended है
enabled_commands: specific commands list करना security के लिए better है
